work.name: Robert Bosch GmbH
highlights: Analyzed competitors' strategies in ASEAN, Japan, and China, researching production volumes, manufacturing locations, financials, and hiring trends, and created 5 PowerBI dashboards to deliver actionable insights for product managers via SharePoint.

Built a web scraper in Azure ML Studio to collect and preprocess 15+ daily automotive news using Azure OpenAI API for data refinement and integrating outputs into a Bosch GenAI chatbot as a PoC for LLM-based market analysis.

Created a SharePoint-based knowledge management repository guided by the SECI framework, centralizing data to improve efficiency for product managers, VPs, and sales teams, saving up to 7 hours weekly on information retrieval and collaboration.

work.name: Chair of Information Systems, Digital Health - Prof. Dr. Christian Maier
highlights: Supported the development of a new Digital Health master’s course for 50+ students by creating 5 lectures and updating Digital Change Management master course materials with recent research, leading to improved student grades compared to prior semesters.

work.name: Rox Health GmbH
work.position: Working Student - Data Analyst in Digital Health
highlights: Championed the use of Metabase to visualize data from 10,000 menopausal women by designing 4 dashboards that analyzed symptoms, delivering insights that enabled our medical team to identify key challenges and enhance customer consultation.

work.name: Monet Financial Technologies GmbH
work.position: Working Student - Entrepreneur in Residence in Early-Stage Start-Up
highlights: Decreased CPA by 10% and increased ROAS by 5% by implementing and analyzing a data-driven performance marketing strategy across Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, and Google Ads in DACH and SE with a four-figure monthly budget.

Managed 30 app and web user acquisition campaigns using Google Data Studio dashboards to automate tracking of KPIs and metrics across marketing channels, independently conceptualizing and scaling 100+ video/image ads aligned with performance targets.

work.name: Siemens AG
work.position: Working Student - Data Analyst & Software Asset Management
highlights: Developed and maintained 7 dashboards in Spotfire for international train projects across France, England, Turkey, Germany, and Israel, analyzing GPS and status data for 100+ trains, and documented insights in 5 Confluence articles for customer teams.

Supported the Siemens Energy carve-out by analyzing and determining six-figure software license fees and preparing appropriate licensing for 250+ employees, ensuring compliance and cost-effective allocation.

work.name: Zollhof Tech Incubator GmbH
highlights: Designed and evaluated a clickable prototype for HUK-Coburg Insurance by using design thinking methodologies, addressing five customer pain points, and demonstrated a potential 15% increase in private insurance sales based on feedback and usability testing.

work.name: aConTech GmbH
highlights: Created a configurable Excel simulation for companies with 50+ employees to analyze pay-as-you-use Microsoft licensing cost, integrating PowerBI to visualize cost comparisons and demonstrate potential savings of up to 25%.

work.name: School of Business and Economics at University of Erlangen-Nuremberg
work.position: Research and Undergraduate Assistant - Statistics, Data Analytics in R, Analysis & Linear Algebra
highlights: Conducted weekly tutorials for 80+ students per semester in Statistics, Linear Algebra, Data Analytics, and Accounting, utilizing live coding in R and exam-focused Q&A sessions, achieving an overall average pass rate of 92% across courses.

volunteer.position: Co-Founder and Chairman of the Board
volunteer.summary: Co-founded and managed an organization focused on addressing humanitarian challenges.
highlights: Increased membership to 31 members and coordinated fundraising, projects, and financial operations.
Raised €15,000 in sponsorships and facilitated the donation of over 200 refurbished computers for socially disadvantaged students.

volunteer.organization: Bundesverband Deutscher Volks- und Betriebswirte e.V.
volunteer.summary: Honorary position focusing on corporate relations and student engagement.
highlights: Organized 3+ workshops, lectures, and case studies in collaboration with companies in South Germany.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered to support organizational activities and events.
highlights: Managed 15+ participants for a seminar trip to the Bundestag and Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Berlin.

volunteer.summary: Supported UNICEF's mission by organizing and leading events and workshops.
highlights: Organized and planned 3+ benefit concerts and a fundraising run.
Conducted workshops for 100+ elementary school students to raise awareness about children's rights.

volunteer.organization: Student Network for Ethics in Economics and Practice e.V.
volunteer.summary: Promoted fair trade practices and organized ethical events.
highlights: Organized 5 fair trade operations for the university, including product sourcing, events, and advocacy for fair trade practices on campus.

volunteer.summary: Provided tutoring and mentorship to refugees.
highlights: Tutored and mentored 10+ unaccompanied underage refugees.
Conducted tutorials and organized leisure activities to support integration and learning.

awards.title: 1st Place 'YOUNGAGEMENT – The Award for Young Engagement'
awards.summary: Interactive cigarette disposal bins that encourage responsible waste disposal by allowing smokers to 'vote' on questions with their cigarette butts. Installed in high-traffic smoker areas with customizable and engaging questions.

awards.title: 1st Place 'YOUNGAGEMENT – The Award for Young Engagement'
awards.summary: A project addressing the digital divide in education by sourcing and refurbishing laptops for financially disadvantaged students to ensure access to online learning and tutoring, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic.

awards.title: 1st Place Student Ideation Challenge
awards.summary: Awarded for innovative ideation in a student competition about remote diagnosis for machines during malfunctions via smartphone using sound files.

awards.title: PROMOS Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for international exchange and academic excellence.
